txt.en: The miner Wilim was wounded during the attempt to flee the mine, but managed to hide from the bugan.

'Ah! You have come to find me? I have been trapped here since the bugan attacked and could not escape on my own because of my wounds.\n\n'Will you help me escape? The Turch-l√ªth are a poor people, and I cannot offer much, but perhaps Cada will have something with which to rewards you?'
Wilim awaits rescue in the Barnavon Mine.\n\nYou should escort Wilim to the mine entrance.
'Aye, Wilim has returned already, and his wounds are being tended to.\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder], for your aid.'
Cada is outside the Barnavon Mine.\n\nYou should return to Cada and let him know that you escorted Wilim to freedom.
'I am ready to go... lead on, friend!'
Talk to Cada at the mine
